reporter_caption.center: IN RE ESTATE OF LEEDY, 73 Mont. 601 (1925)

caption.center: IN RE ESTATE OF SCHUYLER C. LEEDY, DECEASED.

posture.italic: Appeal from District Court, County of Phillips.

opinion.opinion_text: Pursuant to stipulation of counsel, it is ordered that the appeal in the above-entitled matter be dismissed.
opinion.attorneys:
Mr. S.C. Ford, for Appellant.
Mr. Robert S. McKellar, for Respondent.
